remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消显示脚本错误并显示自己自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例需要您的应用程序主机名为控件`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#451)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#451)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`如果你想要自己的自定义错误消息显示给用户，或完全禁止显示错误。Set this property to `true` if you wish to display your own custom error message to the user, or suppress the error entirely. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消显示脚本错误并显示自己自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例需要您的应用程序主机名为控件`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/CS/Form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/VB/Form1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在托管 HTML 文档，其中包含帧，可能不会明显哪个框架负责生成错误。If you are hosting an HTML document that contains frames, it might not be evident which frame is responsible for generating the error. 此属性用于提供调试信息，以便开发人员可以更好地缩小问题。Use this property to provide debugging information so that a developer can better narrow down the problem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
